name: alex-c-line
description: Command-line tool with commands to streamline the developer workflow
author: alextheman

scripts.change-major: pnpm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: pnpm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: pnpm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.command: pnpm run build && echo && echo "Command output:" && node dist/index.js
scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript
